main event: Observation of an unidentified flying object that emitted sparks and a deep roaring sound near Point Lookout, Maryland on 11 October 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 2.5 hours,The object was described as round and spherical,The object alternated between reddish and white sparks,It produced a deep roaring sound that did not resemble conventional aircraft noise,Major O. E. Druehl expressed curiosity and concluded it was a genuine unidentified object.
sighted object: an unidentified spherical object emitting sparks
witness description: Mr. __________, age unknown, Hyattsville, Maryland and Mr. __________, age unknown, West Hyattsville, Maryland
